text: Börje Vestlund (2 February 1960 – 22 September 2017) was a Swedish social democratic politician. He was a Member of the Riksdag from 2002 until his death in 2017. He was openly gay. Vestlund died on 22 September 2017 in Stockholm, Sweden at the age of 67. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2017 deaths Category:LGBT politicians Category:Gay men Category:Swedish politicians
title: Börje Vestlund
